author: Yuurei
text:
"As flowers adrift in the blue sky,
I recall our dauntless youth.
The Cloud Recesses welcome the spring tide once more.
Hidden behind the clouds are distant mountain peaks.
Relentlessly pining for the truth.
Of a lover long gone,
A frozen heart keeps hoping." 

#WangXian https://t.co/iFRFoOP2i7

author: Yuurei
text:
Started to clean my computer and changed my desktop background after almost 4 years.

#WangXian just gives me happiness  and the best of it: it's canon. Nobody can come with the: "They are not gay!" - Bullshit 😍

My Screensaver still remains NaruSasu btw ❤️ https://t.co/A5oE7T7pze

author: Yuurei
text:
"They are married bohoo now you have to like it!"

Believe me when I tell you: I don't give a fuck.
I don't care what YOU ship and what you think that's "right" and "canon" 
When I block a ship/name/character, I don't want it on my TL. It's as simple as that.
DEAL WITH IT.

author: Yuurei
text:
Genshin fandom in a nutshell.

Back then:
"Zhongli and Childe are JUST business partners! There's no reason to ship them!"

Now:
"Oh let's ship Yae and Ayato!"

The hypocrisy whenever it's about gay vs straight ships but the same concept.

Pathetic.

author: Yuurei
text: Barret is real guys! He did an amazing job with the Cosplay 😱😍👍 https://t.co/YBi82MtKks

author: Yuurei
text:
Back when I started Cosplay, a "friend" told me I shouldn't do Sasuke because it would never look good on me. I was afraid that's true but still gave it a try. And my whole fanbase was build on the fact, that I did an amazing job.
The "friend" btw was a Sasuke Cosplayer theirself https://t.co/vEWnD8ZMS9
